channel.title: Runes for trade perhaps maybe
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Runes for trade perhaps maybe" - I keep getting lightning >_>;

item.title: Re: Runes for trade perhaps maybe
item.content:encoded: If you have several Lightnings in store, why not sell them and buy the runes you need from the money you get? Runes aren't that expensive in the Marketplace right now

item.title: Re: Runes for trade perhaps maybe
item.content:encoded: I've got a wolf rune I'd like to get rid of, mainly for a snake rune though, i need one of those pretty badly.

item.title: Runes for trade perhaps maybe
item.content:encoded: I have an Ocelot and several Lightning. I would like to trade one of these lightning for something I don't already haveâ€¦ which, as you can see, is most of them. le sigh. ~shakes fist and curses the RNG~
